programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: The United States is in the grip of an illiteracy crisis, with nearly one in five adults now unable to read. Reporter Kiki King visits Detroit, a city where two thirds of high school students struggle with basic reading and where things have deteriorated so much that a group of high school students is suing the state of Michigan for failing to teach them adequately.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: The architect looks back at some amazing spaces, from a double decker bus with a retractable roof to a futuristic house with a living room hidden under the bed. George also recalls a trip to Germany featuring a space where an entire room mechanically opened like a drawer.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The popular armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Hosts Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by three stars of new West End play The Philanthropist, as Lily Cole, Simon Bird and Tom Rosenthal help the trio dissect the week's events. The hosts make use of the £isitok twitter handle, where viewers tweet in edgy current affairs questions that more fearful shows might duck.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Self-confessed nerd Lachlan strikes gold when he sits down to eat with psychologist Rachel - who turns out to be an avid Star Wars fan. Nanny and part-time weightlifter Lucy hopes to pick up a new partner in the restaurant - and it seems as though charity administrator Caroline may be the one for her - while Alistair, who at 5ft 7 worries about his height, meets magazine editor Emily. Will he be talking tall after their date?.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.sub-title: Look What the Wind Blew In.
programme.desc: It is the morning after a big storm and the beach is littered with flotsam and jetsam.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Someone seems to be pilfering precious objects on Driftwood Bay, and Puffin is sure that he knows why they are vanishing - but no-one will listen to him.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster is upset when a leg falls off her teddy bear and she is frightened to play with it in case it breaks again.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: While the pups prepare for a tree dedication ceremony, Alex sets up his own mini- patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle and Bunny.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team is asked to build a wind farm to power the Sea Life Centre. However, Scoop becomes overambitious and causes damage to some of the turbines. Animated antics with the friendly handyman and his hard-working pals.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman tries to make his mum's birthday special by baking a cake with Mike. However, their good intentions end up causing a fire.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Luke makes pals with a nervous deer and tries to get the other engines to work quietly to avoid startling his new acquaintance.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive Monkey's friends have a surprise in store for him at the Rare Breeds Farm.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta steals Samira's necklace and the girls must get it back before she finds out its special power.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Wonky Toys.
programme.desc: The toys visit Fuse's workshop for a check-up, but they are all wonky when they come out.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pup and the Very Big Baby.
programme.desc: The team works together to save a beached baby whale that has become stranded on Adventure Bay, and reunite it with its mother.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo and Gaston rescue Nanny Plum from a predicament.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Digby accidentally lets Fizzy's wings escape, Chips and Grizel discover that flying isn't as easy as they thought.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet and her friends go with Madame Gazelle to see Pedro Pony, who is unwell.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: The little girl solves a noise problem when Ellington the elephant's loud singing keeps the other jungle animals awake. Dan the panda helps by teaching him how to sing softly.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: When Blue Claw the crab mistakes another seagull for Gus, it's up to the real Gus to rescue Blue Claw before he ends up in trouble.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The work of doctors at Farnham Road Surgery in Slough, Berkshire. Dr Jackie Bulger wonders why diabetic Sarah's insulin levels are sky high, and as she delves deeper, she discovers the patient is also suffering depression and has not eaten properly in three months. A concerned mum brings in her baby, who has a persistent rash, and although a thorough examination rules out meningitis, Dr Sabina Shaik does detect something else.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordo and Dan use their Tasers to help arrest a knife-wielding teenager, Jim leads five units in the boxing in of a car suspected of carrying drugs, and Tim and Tom tackle a mouthy drunk who has crashed his van.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Leo and David learn their mother is coming to Erinsborough, so make plans to confront her about the identity of their father. Sheila realises she has made a drunken mistake.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Fiance
programme.desc: A woman joins forces with a reporter to clear the name of her fiance, who has becomes the prime suspect in a murder case. However, not everything is as it seems. Thriller, starring Jenny Wade, Jordi Vilasuso and Taylor Cole.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Leo and David learn their mother is coming to Erinsborough, so make plans to confront her about the identity of their father. Sheila realises she has made a drunken mistake.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: A woman owes five months' rent, but refuses to leave unless the bailiffs arrive, while a man wanted to sell his house post-breakup, but the tenants are still there five years later. Plus, a man happily living in his garden shed.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Britain's Most Married Man.
programme.desc: Profile of a 67-year-old Somerset man who is hoping to get married for the ninth time, once his 27-year-old fiancee arrives from the Philippines. Ron believes that having Cristel around to care for him during in his old age will make him less of a burden on the state. Plus, a Lowestoft carer who looks after his wife hopes that moving into their first proper home together will bring them more happiness, and an out-of-work Liverpool man dreams of a life on the ocean waves.(n)

programme.title: Rich House, Poor House
programme.desc: Families from opposite ends of the wealth and class divide swap homes, budgets and social status for seven days to discover how the other half lives. This week, the Caddy family of Bristol trade places with the Williams family from Weston-super-Mare. The Caddys rank in the top 10 per cent of Britain's wealthy, and live in a seven-bedroom home, while for the eight-strong Williams family, who are among the nation's poorest 10 per cent, the swap means leaving their rented three-bedroom house and enjoying a weekly budget of £1,700 instead of their usual £110.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach. Includes 5 News Update at 6pm.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: In the upland hills of the Lake District's Borrowdale valley, the presenter meets one of the last tenant sheep farmers, who is facing challenging times but is determined to keep working his farm. The actor and history buff also receives an exclusive tour of the only inhabited island on Derwentwater, learns how to cook chutney at Grasmere, gets a rare sighting of a red squirrel, and boards a tourist boat at Ullswater to discover the integral part they played in the industrial heritage of the area.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Engineer Rob Bell tells the story behind the design and construction of Isambard Kingdom Brunel's famous bridge over the picturesque Avon gorge at Bristol, and discovers that some people question whether it was entirely the product of his own devising. The bridge remained unfinished in Brunel's lifetime, but when he died in 1859, his friends decided that the bridge should be completed as a memorial, using the chains from another of his suspension bridges that was being demolished.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice tackles a Grade II-listed building in Frome, Somerset.(n)

programme.title: HouseBusters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis and her team of new-age practitioners suggest ways in which changes to homes could positively affect the lives of their owners.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Skipper helps Pip put together a new radio-controlled plane, and they take it for a test flight on the beach, only for Shelvis to mistake it for a resting place.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: A disc by Salty's old band, The Fiddlin' Flatfish, is washed up on the beach. Lily finds out that he misses them, so she put together a new line-up.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The heroine tries to find the perfect place to pitch a tent.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Alex loses his first tooth, but when he looks for it later he cannot find it anywhere, so Ryder and the pups try to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are commissioned to build the new Spring City Clock, the work goes well until they realise some of the pieces are missing.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Station Officer Steele joins Trevor and the gang for a picnic at Crabscuttle cove, but when their satnav goes wrong and leads them into wet sand, Elvis must try to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Luke delivers stone to Ulfstead Castle, where he meets Millie, the Earl's private narrow-gauge engine, and the pair agree to swap jobs for the day.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive Monkey dips his fishing net in the pond and is surprised by what he finds.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta steals Samira's staff and turns everyone into chickens.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Tug of War Rope.
programme.desc: The Pirates and the Ninjas line-up for the tug of war contest in Daredale, but the rope snaps, leaving Noddy to find out who cut it.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Paw Patrol team help to rescue a lost kitten, but the feline causes mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny is magically frozen after being rude to a witch in the forest, leaving Ben and Holly to find a way to thaw her out.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Grizel falls into a trap she was making for Digby and cannot climb out, so Mungo tries to get some rope to rescue her without telling the others.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in a rescue helicopter.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet teaches her visiting baby cousin Alexander his first word.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Monty the Meerkat asks Wissper for help, but he does not seem too sure what his problem is.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: Ken Toyn's plans to build a floating workshop for his holiday project suffer a setback when some seals decide to use it as their new home.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and the panel debate the day's issues before opening the discussion to the studio audience and inviting viewers to call in or text their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Ameet Tailor lends his expertise to Daniel, a 20-something self-confessed cannabis addict who has become frustrated by his inability to kick the habit. It is up to Dr Ameet to calm his patient and get him into rehab. Dr David Ward deals with angry Irishman David, who arrives on crutches and with an injured hand following a fight. David is furious with the council, and is taking a distinctly negative approach to life, so the doctor suggests he tackle his problems one at a time. Finally, nurse Sheila Wellavise helps cheerful patient Mario, who almost cut off the end of his finger while using a circular saw while doing a spot of DIY.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: Britain's Got Talent 2014 finalists the Addict Initiative help Jon Bentley test the latest wireless earbuds in an extreme dance routine. Georgie Barrat continues to help struggling football team Monkey Tree FC using technology to focus on potential diet and nutrition wins, while Ortis Deley hears about quantum computers which it's suggested will be millions, billions, or even trillions of times faster than current technology.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac tells Sam she should leave Summer Bay immediately, Hunter is devastated to see the growing bond between Mason and Olivia and Luc's baby blessing goes disastrously wrong.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: David follows a series of clues that he thinks will lead him to his father, Leo and Amy struggle to hide their feelings for each other, while tension rises between Finn and Elly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is found murdered and Gibbs and McGee are called in when she is discovered to be carrying ID bearing the name Sgt Patricia Moreno, a US marine known to have died several years earlier. The victim is discovered to have come to America from Afghanistan and a necklace reveals a fingerprint that leads the team to a known assassin. Guest starring Lolita Davidovich.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.sub-title: Lost Letter Mysteries: From the Heart.
programme.desc: Premiere. The Postables discover a 200-year-old Valentine that could change history, while their investigation of a damaged letter leads to a public figure who could be brought down by its contents. The aftermath of Valentine's Day sees Oliver, Shane, Norman and Rita each dealing with heartbreaking circumstances. Drama, starring Eric Mabius, Kristin Booth and Geoff Gustafson.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: David follows a series of clues that he thinks will lead him to his father, Leo and Amy struggle to hide their feelings for each other, while tension rises between Finn and Elly.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac tells Sam she should leave Summer Bay immediately, Hunter is devastated to see the growing bond between Mason and Olivia and Luc's baby blessing goes disastrously wrong.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: The Gadget Show
programme.desc: Craig Charles puts some state-of-the-art headphones to the test. These wireless units incorporate a voice-controlled smart assistant and a fitness tracker, all for £99. Jon Bentley dials up Chinese smartphone the Huawei Honor 6X to see if it is actually better than its more established rivals - and at a fraction of current prices. Plus, Georgie Barrat gets exclusive access to the New York Toy Fair, to check out latest tech playthings that will hit the shops in a few months' time.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Coast to Coast
programme.desc: The presenter visits Eden Valley, Cumbria, where he makes a dramatic ascent to the limestone-paved Great Asby Scar, the last evidence of a 300 million-year-old tropical sea. Smardale Gill viaduct has Tony marvelling at its engineering genius, before he investigates the 21st-century technology driving a traditional dairy. The actor and history buff gets a masterclass working with border collie sheepdogs before heading to Nine Standards Rigg, a summit high on the backbone of Britain, where he contemplates the origins of the huge drystone cairns that dominate the skyline.(n)

programme.title: Spectacular Spain with Alex Polizzi
programme.desc: New series. The hotelier and presenter shares her passion for Spain's culture and people, and makes some new discoveries along the way. She begins in the north east, a region often overlooked by Brits, where she enjoys a luxurious cabernet grape body scrub, and is shown around an astonishing cellar full of ancient wines. Alex experiences the craziness of the San Fermin fiesta, including the legendary running of the bulls through the streets of Pamplona, before heading to Barcelona - Spain's second largest city - famous for its vibrant, cosmopolitan character, and abundance of art and architecture.(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson: Man in the Mirror
programme.desc: Profile of the singer, following his development from child star with the Jackson 5 to becoming an iconic performer in his own right as an adult. The programme explores his difficult relationship with his family and makes the case that growing up in the public eye had a devastating psychological impact that he was never able to recover from.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a remote planet and the survival of the stranded passengers may depend on a convict, whose special gift comes in handy when night falls(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Based on the popular series of books by Darren Shan, Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant tells the story of a small-town teen who inadvertently shatters a 200-year-old truce between warring factions of vampires. Sixteen-year-old Darren (Chris Massoglia) is your typical adolescent he spends most of his time with his best friend, Steve (Josh Hutcherson), earns decent grades, and generally manages to stay out of trouble. But trouble finds Darren when he and Steve make the acquaintance of a vampire named Larten Crepsley (John C. Reilly) while attending a traveling freak show at a local theater(n)

programme.title: Tremors 4: The Legend Begins
programme.desc: In this engrossing prequel set in the 1800s, giant killer worms threaten a town when workers unwittingly discover them hibernating underground. Michael Gross, Sara Botsford, John Dixon, Billy Drago, Lydia Look, Lo Ming. Directed by S. S. Wilson(n)

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: The son of an aristocrat in 19th-century California dons a mask to help fight for the downtrodden people oppressed by a wicked governor. Complicating matters is the vigilante's affections for the governor's beautiful niece(n)

programme.title: A Stranger Among Us
programme.desc: A tough New York cop is put on the case of a young Hasidic diamond cutter who has gone missing with a fortune in gems. But the apparently open-and-shut case becomes more complicated when his body turns up - minus the diamonds. When she must go undercover in the Hasidic community to track down the killer, the cop experiences events which change her life(n)

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, a young girl with asthma is kidnapped and held for ransom, but her captors tell her parents that they'll deprive the child of her medication unless they comply with their terms, one of which is not to contact the police(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: This utterly chilling horror film centers on a young woman who must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

programme.title: Eraser
programme.desc: Explosive thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger as a rogue U.S. Marshal who, when framed for murder, must bring down the people responsible and clear his name(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realise that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A stranger steps in to save a pregnant woman from hitman Hertz. He delivers her baby and takes off, pursued by the killer and his henchmen(n)

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: In the near-future, tough mercenary Toorop is hired to transport a girl from Russia to New York, unaware that she is believed by some to be the new messiah(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: The X-Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: A priest's visions bring FBI agents Mulder (David Duchovny) and Scully (Gillian Anderson) back together for an investigation involving the mysterious disappearance of a group of women. Chris Carter directed the second big-screen film inspired by the classic TV series(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: P.T. Anderson's (Boogie Nights) wonderful ensemble drama with Tom Cruise (nominated for an Oscar), Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Julianne Moore, John C. Reilly all looking for meaning and happiness in the Valley(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Director Roger Michell follows up the hit romantic comedy Notting Hill with this thought-provoking thriller. Ben Affleck and Samuel L. Jackson star, respectively, as Gavin Banek and Doyle Gibson, two New York men whose lives become accidentally intertwined in a Good Friday fender bender on the FDR Drive. Late for a crucial appointment, hotshot lawyer Gavin tosses Doyle a blank check and leaves the scene, while Doyle, whose car is inoperable, is late for a court-appointed custody hearing. A recovering alcoholic, Doyle's tardiness doesn't sit well with the judge, who - sick of waiting for Gipson - grants custody to Doyle's ex-wife in Doyle's absence. The situation worsens when it becomes evident that Doyle has an equally important file belonging to Gavin, which proves that an elderly man gave Banek's firm power-of-attorney over his foundation. So begins an escalating war of words and deeds between the two men. Soon, egged on by an associate, Gavin hires a "fixer" to destroy Doyle's credit, forcing Doyle to fire back with some cunning moves of his own(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: A man (Sam Rockwell) attempts to pull his life together by teaching his daughter's (Emma Roberts) high-school basketball team in this indie comedy by Grace Is Gone writer/director James C. Strouse. Rob Corddry co-stars in this Gigi/Plum Pictures production(n)

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: At John Hughes High School aspiring artist Janey Briggs is an outcast because of her plain, bespectacled looks and paint-splattered overalls. Football hero Jake Wyler makes a bet that he can transform Janey into a gorgeous prom queen, a wager he may come to regret as he discovers Janey's true inner beauty(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: News of the death of air ace Rafe reaches his sweetheart, who starts to fall for his best pal. Rafe shows up alive in Hawaii, but the trio's problems look miniscule in comparison to the devastation wreaked by the Japanese on Pearl Harbor. Romance set against a blockbuster backdrop with the biggest budget ever footed by a single studio(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Prohibition-era action drama about a feared gunslinger who cruises into a Texan border town and finds himself caught in the middle of a gang war. With loyalties to no one but himself, he seizes the chance to play the bootlegging Irish and Italian gangs against each other to his own advantage(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio plays aCIA agent on the ground in Jordan, chasing a powerful terrorist leader(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In this harrowing historical drama set in the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise returns as both producer and agent Ethan Hunt in his second action-adventure adaptation of the television series. Directed by John Woo, the action speeds across the continents, as Ethan accepts his latest mission: retrieve and destroy the supply of a genetically modified disease called Chimera, as well as recover the cure, Bellerophon, from of a group of terrorists led by Sean Ambrose. For the mission to succeed, Ethan must persuade jewel thief Nyah Hall to join him, which he does by nearly running her car off a cliff. When Nyah becomes infected with the disease, Ethan must battle to save the woman he now loves, even if that means sending her into enemy territory, and the hands of her ex-boyfriend. Also starring Ving Rhames. Edited for violence and language(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Randall "Memphis" Raines, a retired car thief, is drawn back into action when a crime lord threatens to whack Raines' brother unless the thief steals 50 top-model cars within 72 hours. Raines recruits a crew of fellow carjackers, including an old pro and an old flame, and the race is on(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: In this spy-thriller former MI-5 agent Will Holloway (Kit Harington) is forced to partner with Harry Pierce (Peter Firth), the MI5 Intelligence Chief who decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist Adem Qasim (Elyes Gabel) who escaped during routine prisoner transport. A disgraced Harry faked his death after the Qasim escaped and Will was brought back into the MI-5 fold to locate Harry and return him to headquarters. Harry convinces Will that there is a traitor in MI-5 and they must work together to prevent a terrorist attack on the city of London. The film is based on the British television series Spooks created by David Wolstencroft. Directed by Bharat Nalluri. Cast includes Lara Pulver, David Harewood and Jennifer Ehle(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a remote planet and the survival of the stranded passengers may depend on a convict, whose special gift comes in handy when night falls(n)

programme.desc: In this tense thriller, a young girl with asthma is kidnapped and held for ransom, but her captors tell her parents that they'll deprive the child of her medication unless they comply with their terms, one of which is not to contact the police(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: This utterly chilling horror film centers on a young woman who must protect her brother from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother, who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana(n)

The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: The X-Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: A priest's visions bring FBI agents Mulder (David Duchovny) and Scully (Gillian Anderson) back together for an investigation involving the mysterious disappearance of a group of women. Chris Carter directed the second big-screen film inspired by the classic TV series(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: P.T. Anderson's (Boogie Nights) wonderful ensemble drama with Tom Cruise (nominated for an Oscar), Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Julianne Moore, John C. Reilly all looking for meaning and happiness in the Valley(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Director Roger Michell follows up the hit romantic comedy Notting Hill with this thought-provoking thriller. Ben Affleck and Samuel L. Jackson star, respectively, as Gavin Banek and Doyle Gibson, two New York men whose lives become accidentally intertwined in a Good Friday fender bender on the FDR Drive. Late for a crucial appointment, hotshot lawyer Gavin tosses Doyle a blank check and leaves the scene, while Doyle, whose car is inoperable, is late for a court-appointed custody hearing. A recovering alcoholic, Doyle's tardiness doesn't sit well with the judge, who - sick of waiting for Gipson - grants custody to Doyle's ex-wife in Doyle's absence. The situation worsens when it becomes evident that Doyle has an equally important file belonging to Gavin, which proves that an elderly man gave Banek's firm power-of-attorney over his foundation. So begins an escalating war of words and deeds between the two men. Soon, egged on by an associate, Gavin hires a "fixer" to destroy Doyle's credit, forcing Doyle to fire back with some cunning moves of his own(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: A man (Sam Rockwell) attempts to pull his life together by teaching his daughter's (Emma Roberts) high-school basketball team in this indie comedy by Grace Is Gone writer/director James C. Strouse. Rob Corddry co-stars in this Gigi/Plum Pictures production(n)

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: At John Hughes High School aspiring artist Janey Briggs is an outcast because of her plain, bespectacled looks and paint-splattered overalls. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a race from London's Wembley Stadium to Milan's San Siro, the home of Italian football giants AC and Inter. A price restriction leads Jeremy to grab the keys to a Shelby Mustang GT500, which costs the equivalent of £35,000 in America and packs a supercharged punch of more than 650bhp. James and Richard pin their hopes on the pan-European rail network in a bid to secure the prize of tickets to a top-flight football match, with nothing but a long journey home awaiting the losers. On the test track, Jeremy puts Toyota's GT86 coupe through its paces, and its promise of entertaining rear-wheel-drive handling should put a smile on his face. Plus, singer-songwriter Amy Macdonald gets to grips with the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.desc: Mindy has some important news for Danny - but just as she is getting ready to tell him, his father and half-sister arrive for a visit, leading to an awkward family dinner.(n)

programme.title: The Mindy Project
programme.desc: Mindy's plans to start her own practice in San Francisco are jeopardised when she is unable to get a loan, while Danny struggles to tell his colleagues he is moving away.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige encounters a cursed 18th-century pirate in search of the Fountain of Youth, and a federal agent arrives in town to investigate the Halliwell sisters. Leslie manipulates a contest so he can spend time with Phoebe, while Leo battles the creature that caused him to kill an Elder.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Brendan Sheerin spoils the tourists with a visit to glamorous Monte Carlo, before surprising them with a special twist to mark the halfway point of the trip.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Glasgow, outreach manager Gill and accountant Mark kick the competition off with a night of comforting food and even more comfortable company. On day two, mischievous Derek pushes Matt's buttons and ends up being banished from the kitchen. On the final evening, a cooking disaster sees Cat blowing her top, but Martin saves the day.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey is invited to learn about the `guy code' when Jeff tells her that his friend was unfaithful to his wife, insisting that she keeps the information to herself in accordance with the rules of the code. Megyn Price and Patrick Warburton star.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff lives it up during a night on the town, leaving Russell in trouble and Adam reflecting on the details surrounding his impending nuptials. Audrey invites Jennifer to a wedding, where a boy propositions them. Comedy, starring David Spade.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike becomes tired of being the butt of neighbourhood prankster Ben Milbauer's jokes, but when he booby-traps his doorbell, the teenage nuisance is seriously injured, and his father demands the Baxters foot the boy's hospital bills. Meanwhile, Kristin begins her college classes, and Ed worries about the financial repercussions when Kyle is hurt at work. Comedy, guest starring Uriah Shelton, with Tim Allen.(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mandy worries that Mike won't take to her new boyfriend Terrence, an animal rights activist, when she brings him home to meet the family. Kyle makes a discovery about his ancestors - and Ed's - that could lead to strife between them.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel opts to ground Lennox when she discovers she is failing chemistry and tells her to study. However, Mel's father, Senator Russell Burke, shows up and unexpectedly undermines her authority. Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel sees Joe having a secret meeting with a girl named Tessa in the basement, and discovers they are on the search for her brother-in-law. Meanwhile, Mel and the nanny begin to suspect Ryder is being bullied at school when he keeps losing his belongings, but only make things worse by trying to get his stuff back. Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben enlists Riley's help to prove to the bar's owner that he is responsible enough to fill the new manager's job, but his tactic of posing as a family man soon backfires. Bonnie buys baby Emma a very girly pushchair, but Tucker and Danny exchange it for one they believe to be much cooler in the hope of attracting the attention of women.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: Take Her Out of the Ballgame.
programme.desc: Riley stands in as captain of softball league team after they keep losing, but her competitive side soon takes over and she starts taking the role too seriously, while Danny finds out that Bonnie is dating his hockey coach.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily persuades Robin to gatecrash a high-school prom with her in an attempt to get a look at a potential band for her wedding. Meanwhile, Ted and Marshall stay at home and prepare the invitations.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily secretly applies for an art scholarship, while Ted receives a phone call from a dating agency claiming to have found his perfect match. However, he is forced to put the idea on hold because of his ever-present feelings for Robin. Meanwhile, Barney's prank war steps up a gear.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Murray takes Adam to a Phillies baseball game and allows him to leave his seat on his own for the first time, only to find Adam immediately gets lost in the stadium. Beverly accompanies Erica and Barry on a shopping trip - but they begin arguing on the way home.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica decides to put college on hold and pursue her dream of becoming a pop singer - which causes her parents no end of stress. Meanwhile, an April Fools' Day prank leads to an all-out war between Adam and Barry. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey, Jeff Garlin and Hayley Orrantia.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon helps Leonard drop off a parcel for Penny, but when he sees how messy her room is, he tries to do a good deed - which is not well received. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset to learn Penny is dating someone, so his friends and fellow scientists encourage him to seek a new romance by asking another woman out. Guest starring Sara Gilbert (Roseanne), with Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Planning to elope, Marshall and Lily drag the gang to Atlantic City, but face a three-day wait for a marriage licence. The delay gives the couple time to realise they would like to celebrate their marriage with their families. Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris star.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin refuses to go to the mall, leading the group to wonder why she seems so determined to avoid the place, while Ted and Barney discuss women. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For the first time in his career, Jake has a growing number of cases he just can't seem to solve, and the other detectives worry his run of bad luck will rub off on them. Holt asks Amy to take charge of a community outreach programme for at-risk youths, and Boyle helps Jeffords with a tough personal assignment. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake meets an attractive medical examiner at a crime scene, but annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with her cause a hold-up with an autopsy report. Meanwhile, Amy discovers Jeffords has some hidden talents when the police sketch artist goes off sick.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly tries to help Adam navigate a painless path through puberty, but just as his voice is changing, he is cast in the lead role of the school musical. Determined to help him survive the performance, Beverly decides lip-synching might be the answer. Meanwhile, Murray is irked when Erica chooses musician Johnny over Barry's sidekick Geoff as her date for the homecoming dance.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry accidentally records over one of Beverly's prized family videotapes - her treasured keepsake from his fifth birthday party. Meanwhile, Adam and Murray build a robot together, but the project comes between them when they experience creative differences.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon feels threatened by a 15-year-old physics prodigy who is even cleverer than he is, and asks Leonard to help him discredit the precocious teenager's research. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard kick Sheldon off their physics quiz team and replace him with Leslie Winkle, so he decides to prove his superiority by forming a rival quartet of his own. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake tries to impress Amy's father, a former cop, when he comes to Thanksgiving dinner. Holt helps Pimento come to terms with the fact he can no longer be a police officer.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon receives a nasty surprise when he visits his mother in Houston, while Raj's murder mystery party causes conflict for the rest of the gang members. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: A spacecraft is sent to another world, following clues left in ancient artefacts, in search of aliens that may have created the human race. However, the explorers on board discover the extraterrestrials may not be the benevolent creatures they imagined, while the company funding the expedition has its own agenda. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller and Alien prequel, starring Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the lives of the planet's largest marine mammals and the secrets of their survival. Cameramen Doug Allan and Didier Noirot travel from the Indian Ocean to the Arctic seas, filming 200-ton blue whales and fighting humpbacks. The team also discovers that southern right whales possess a pair of one-ton testicles and reveals how Arctic bowheads can live to be more than 200 years old. Narrated by Stephen Fry.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: Alan Rabinowitz, Gordon Buchanan, George McGavin, Steve Backshall and Justine Evans travel to the far-flung corners of the Himalayas in search of tigers, snow leopards and clouded leopards, on an expedition aimed at helping the survival of these creatures. The team gets to work by tracking elusive tigers and setting up remote-controlled cameras to film the animals in action.(n)

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: The team travels along the east coast of northern Britain, beginning in the English border town of Berwick-upon-Tweed and ending in Aberdeen. Miranda Krestovnikoff explores the wildlife inhabiting a marine reserve near St Abbs, while Alice Roberts discovers how rust is threatening the Forth Road Bridge and Neil Oliver re-creates a wartime scheme to train gulls to search for German U-boats.(n)

programme.title: Great White Matrix
programme.desc: Navy diver and shark attack survivor Paul De Gelder and cameraman Andy Casagrande document the mysteries of modern shark science, including the drivers of predatory behaviour.(n)

programme.title: Killer Whales - Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: A look at research into the lives of the marine mammals, including insights into the creatures' intelligence, social interactions and parental instincts.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Marine life at the poles, where winter temperatures frequently fall to a numbing -40C. Even when the sun reappears in the spring, its weak rays take a long time to melt the ice. David Attenborough describes how wildlife including seals, whales, polar bears and penguins overcome the elements to survive through prolonged cold spells.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: The documentary explores the intelligence of marine mammals, discovering just how smart whales and dolphins really are. Scientist Denise Herzing talks about the development of a two-way communication system between dolphins and humans in the Bahamas, while in Western Australia the creatures are filmed using a range of survival skills. In Mexico, grey whales seemingly empathise with humans, while the humpbacks of Alaska pool their talents to increase hunting success. Narrated by Stephen Fry.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Tiger
programme.desc: From the base camp in the Himalayas, the team moves out to track down tigers throughout Bhutan. Steve Backshall is pushed to the limits of his physical endurance when he takes on a white-water river in the eastern jungles, and Gordon Buchanan deploys remote cameras and uses a fingerprinting technique to identify individual cats. Meanwhile, biologist Dr George McGavin meets the predator during a trip to India.(n)

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: The team explores Ireland's west coast, journeying between Galway Bay and Fastnet Rock, the country's southernmost point. Neil Oliver discovers how flotsam washed up on the Galway shoreline inspired Christopher Columbus's journey to America, while Alice Roberts explores the botanical puzzle of the Burren in Co Clare and travels to the monastery on the island of Skellig Michael.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: Horizon: Swallowed by a Black Hole.
programme.desc: Documentary examining what would happen to a gas cloud that strayed within the gravitational reach of a supermassive black hole in the centre of the Milky Way. Across the globe, telescopes were trained on the heart of Earth's galaxy in the expectation of observing the cosmic spectacle for the first time in history.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: The documentary explores the intelligence of marine mammals, discovering just how smart whales and dolphins really are. Scientist Denise Herzing talks about the development of a two-way communication system between dolphins and humans in the Bahamas, while in Western Australia the creatures are filmed using a range of survival skills. In Mexico, grey whales seemingly empathise with humans, while the humpbacks of Alaska pool their talents to increase hunting success. Narrated by Stephen Fry.(n)

programme.title: Sharks of the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Documentary offering an insight into the lives of the many sharks that inhabit the sea, which include the great white, tiger and hammerhead.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: An exploration of the world's most densely inhabited waters, where variations in temperature owing to the year-long cycle of the sun encourage a vast array of marine life, from seals and sharks in the winter, to lobster and salmon in the summer, dolphins in the autumn and the walking handfish in spring. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A special agent called Harry Tasker skilled in languages and counter intelligence has been leading a double life all his married life. His wife believes that he works for a computer company until she becomes involved with a con artist who likes seducing married women...(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: In the plot twisting high-tech thriller Face/Off relentless FBI agent Sean Archer must go dangerously undercover to investigate the location of a lethal biological weapon planted by his arch rival, the sadistic terrorist for hire Castor Troy. After undergoing a radical surgical procedure, Archer literally 'borrows' Troy's face and identity to carry out his mission. But things go awry when Troy emerging from a coma, transforms into Archer and wreaks havoc upon his life, both at work and at home. As the bomb continues to tick and the tension mounts, it becomes a high stakes game of cat and mouse as both Archer and Troy, ironically trapped in their enemy's body, try to save face...their own(n)

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners
programme.desc: Remake of the 1970 comedy classic that follows the adventures of a couple vexed by misfortune whilst in New York City(n)

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Robert Redford in the Bernard Malamud saga of a baseball player with magic in his bat(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Brad Pitt star in David Fincher's Oscar-nominated drama (adapted from Chuck Palahniuk's novel). Norton plays a bored executive who meets Tyler Durden (Pitt) on a plane. This mysterious stranger introduces him to a world of ennui-alleviating physical pain: Fight Club, a secretive society where men vent their frustrations in bare-knuckle fighting in dingy basements. But as Norton becomes more involved, he starts to learn about the shadowy and subversive organisation behind it all... Also starring Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: A year after the original tragedy, Julie James is in college trying to piece her life back together. When her roommate, Karla, wins a trip for four to a tropical island, everything seems to be fine. That changes during a seemingly harmless karaoke session, however, when instead of lyrics a menacing message appears on the teleprompter to return the horror to Julie's life. It's not long before the bodies start piling up, and she once again finds herself facing the wrong end of the knife..(n)

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Navy flyers try to stop an experimental fighter plane rigged with advanced artificial intelligence from starting World War III(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life more seriously(n)

programme.desc: Hancock is a sarcastic, hard-living and misunderstood superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public. When Hancock grudgingly agrees to an extreme makeover from idealistic publicist Ray Embrey, his life and reputation rise from the ashes and all seems right again, until he meets a woman with similar powers to his and the key to his secret past(n)

programme.desc: A widowed advice columnist who is struggling to raise three daughters falls in love with a French beauty---unaware she is his brother's girlfriend. programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Set in 1898, this movie is based on the true story of two lions in Africa that killed 130 people over a nine month period, while a bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter tried to kill them(n)

programme.desc: In Enchanted, a classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City. An inspiring story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: In the final instalment of the buccaneering trilogy, Jack Sparrow is trapped in Davy Jones's Locker, and in his absence the East India Trading Company is taking over the seas. Jack's former crew and his friends Elizabeth and Will must join forces with Captain Barbossa to save Captain Sparrow and bring the entire pirate community together against their common enemy. The scene is set for a high-seas battle of epic proportions(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Blockbuster monster movie with spectacular special effects by the director of 'Independence Day'. Following a bizarre attack on a Japanese fishing vessel and sightings of a strange dinosaur-like creature, scientist Dr Nick Tatopoulos (Matthew Broderick) suspects that radiation from nuclear weapons testing in French Polynesia may have caused a genetic mutation in the local lizard population. The path of destruction leads north, to New York. Will the combined forces of US military be enough to save the city from devastation?(n)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: This 1987 release sees Arnold Schwarzenegger in a familiar role as the action hero leading a team of CIA hired mercenaries into the Central American jungle to take on an alien force. Guess who has to do it all on his own in the end?(n)

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Masquerading as Nazis, a secret team of American commandos attempts to steal a decoding machine from a sinking German U-boat. But their plan goes awry when their own ship is destroyed, and they are stranded on the enemy sub. Oscar-winning World War II thriller stars Matthew McConaughey, Oscar-nominee Harvey Keitel, Golden Globe-nominees Bill Paxton and David Keith, and rock star Jon Bon Jovi. Inspired by actual events(n)

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: Fresh out of jail, master thief Eddie 'Hudson Hawk' Hawkins and his partner Tommy are soon caught up amongst rogue CIA men, a crazy billionaire couple and the works of Leonardo Da Vinci in a plot to scupper the world's economy(n)

programme.title: I Am Ali
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the life story of Muhammad Ali. The film features unprecedented access to the heavyweight champion's personal archives and journals, and features interviews and testimonials with family and friends, as well as contributions from fellow boxers including Mike Tyson, George Foreman and Gene Kilroy.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A woman's body is discovered in an empty swimming pool and all the evidence points to her husband being the prime suspect, but the post-mortem indicates that the victim's vital signs were being monitored and that she was restrained before being shot. Nichols and Stevens find that there have been three similar cases during the previous four years and that the people involved were part of a warped psychological study. Guest starring Dallas Roberts (The Walking Dead, Rubicon).(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The daughter of a wealthy family's housekeeper is raped and murdered, and the authorities are quick to point the finger of blame at a known sex offender. However, Brenda is convinced there is more to the case than meets the eye, and struggles to overcome her own beliefs and concoct a logical explanation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A wealthy 80-year-old man who recently married a young stripper is found dead and, when his widow dies of an overdose, all eyes turn to the butler. Despite a lack of support from her colleagues, Brenda decides to investigate the victim's three grown-up children instead.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The father of a wealthy socialite is found dead after threatening to cause problems for the owner of his daughter's favourite nightspot. The club owner seems a likely suspect, but all is not what it seems - he is actually an FBI agent involved in an undercover operation. Starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A vengeful loan shark kidnaps the family of a financier who owes him money. Unfortunately, Goren and Eames have a tough time proving that an abduction has even taken place, chiefly because the terrified man has been told his daughters will be killed if he talks.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a marine who dropped dead while scaling a wall on an assault course, and a fellow soldier reveals that he was heavily involved with an underground fight club, where competitors would battle for cash. Meanwhile, having returned to work after compassionate leave, Vance discovers paperwork and a key in his late wife's effects that lead him to a safety deposit box containing a stash of cash.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While transporting the corpse of Lt Gordon Roth to the morgue, a flat tyre brings Ducky and Jimmy to a halt and they are abducted and taken to a remote cabin - where one of their captors wants the post-mortem to take place. Back at the scene, Abby finds a blood sample that does not belong to the victim, who in fact bore little resemblance to the picture of Roth in his old school yearbook. Guest starring Valerie Cruz (The Following).(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to gain control of an investigation into the murder of a businessman and is eventually partnered on the case by Fritz. However, she discovers the FBI has ulterior motives, putting their friendship under further strain. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team members are forced to reopen a botched murder investigation from three years previously as they attempt to get a pyromaniac serial killer safely behind bars. Meanwhile, Taylor continues to wage his political war on Brenda's rank. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Robert Gossett.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate when a legal clerk is found murdered in a judge's house. The judge, Dutch Blakemore, admits he was having an affair with the victim, and it soon emerges he was plagiarising her work. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A newly released jailbird attempts to track down the woman he wrote to from prison, and ends up kidnapping her boyfriend, a UN economist. However, when the ex-convict is found dead in a park, Goren and Eames investigate and find that everyone involved in the case has been living a lie.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is stabbed to death after stepping out of her shower, becoming the latest victim of the Dead Rose Slasher. Gibbs is approached by his old friend and barber Frankie Dean, who shares his concern that his son Cameron may be the killer. He explains that a photo-fit released to the media resembles him, and the attacks stopped during a period coinciding with his three-year stint in the navy. Meanwhile, Tony has to take probationary agent Ned Dorneget under his wing.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Marine sergeant Teddy Lemere is killed by a sniper in Afghanistan just after his sniffer dog helps guide a young child out of a minefield. Back in the US, his widow Ruby tells Gibbs and the team that she had recently received a message from her husband saying he might have upset a few people. Abby retrieves a tiny shard of the sniper's bullet from Ted's helmet and finds that it was made in America.(n)

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: The superhero thriller, starring Dan Stevens as troubled mutant David Haller, draws to a close with him facing his biggest challenge yet.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg convinces Brian to take her SATs for her, but when she receives poor exam results everyone begins to question how smart the dog really is. Peter spends the day with the canine, showing him all the joys of being stupid, and the benefits of having a low IQ.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to be recruited as a model - but not everything is as it seems with the job. Meanwhile, Brian accompanies Stewie on a road trip adventure when the baby decides he wants to experience life outside of preschool.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins seek refuge from burglars in a panic room, where Peter whiles away the time by telling Lois and the kids all about their history - including stories of their cavemen ancestors.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part one of three. A brush with death scares Stewie into trying to be nice to the family, but his efforts fail miserably and he ends up becoming an alcoholic. Meanwhile, Peter lands a job on a TV news channel.(n)

programme.title: Samurai Jack
programme.desc: A gravely injured Jack resolves to decide his own fate, as he tackles his deadliest foes yet - assassins from the Cult of Aku.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Rick and Summer throw an intergalactic house party, while Beth and Jerry go on a romantic getaway.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan saves Roger's life, but the pair disagree over the chain of events leading to the rescue, resulting in the alien attempting to make a fresh start. Meanwhile, Steve becomes power-hungry when he is given the job of making announcements over the school's PA system.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to prove he is the alpha male at the Smith house when Steve challenges him for family dominance, while Hayley and Jeff seek marriage counselling after their honeymoon period wears off.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter goes on a second honeymoon with Lois in an effort to put the spark back into their marriage, and tries to get an upgrade on their hotel suite by impersonating Mel Gibson. Meanwhile, Chris gets into trouble for having alcohol at a school dance - despite protesting it was not his.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Fast Times at Buddy Cianci Jr High.
programme.desc: Chris falls in love with new teacher Mrs Lockhart - who takes advantage of his naive infatuation by luring him into a scheme to kill her unsuspecting husband. Meanwhile, Brian takes a job as a substitute teacher and is put in charge of a remedial class. With the guest voice of Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Not All Dogs Go to Heaven.
programme.desc: Meg becomes deeply religious and tries to convert Brian from atheism. Meanwhile, Stewie kidnaps all the cast members of Star Trek: The Next Generation and forces them to be his friends.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian is arrested for possession of cannabis, prompting him to begin a campaign for the drug to be legalised that succeeds beyond his wildest dreams, but results in the residents of Quahog becoming addicts.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan and Francine's social life gets a boost when they meet adventurous couple Tom and Cami, but they realise they cannot keep up with them. However, it isn't long before they devise a plan to slow them down permanently.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger invites Stan to attend one of his acting classes, but tempers flare when they both audition for the same role. Meanwhile, Steve and his friends plan to say goodbye to their childhoods by arranging the greatest sleepover ever.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Nichols and Stevens investigate the murder of a woman who was found lying in the street, apparently strangled to death, and with a concealed wound on her cheek. When tests reveal traces of alcohol and Valium in her system, Stevens contemplates the plausibility of a medical connection, a suspicion that is soon confirmed when a woman with a recently treated hand injury is found murdered in exactly the same manner. Their investigation then heads to the local community hospital where the victims were last seen alive. Starring Jeff Goldblum and Saffron Burrows.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda struggles to gain control of an investigation into the murder of a businessman and is eventually partnered on the case by Fritz. However, she discovers the FBI has ulterior motives, putting their friendship under further strain. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A complaint is filed against Brenda, which threatens her career in the squad, but when Captain Pope offers to help, she is dubious about his intentions. Meanwhile, the detectives are kept busy trying to trace the killer of a Hollywood producer. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The pressure is on for Brenda and her team to solve the murder of a police detective, but as evidence points to one of their own, the Deputy Police Chief struggles to match DNA samples that could prove their case. However, it becomes clear Gabriel and Daniels' relationship to the victim is key to understanding the crime. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A woman's murder bears the hallmarks of one committed by jailed serial killer Kevin Reddick, raising fears that he has found an accomplice to carry on his work while he is in prison. The investigation leads back to a series of experiments performed on Reddick to discover the cause of his madness.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the discovery of a woman's body in the Bronx and learn she was reported missing 20 years previously. Suspicion falls on a businessman and his friend, but inquiries hit a dead end - until the team finds a link to two earlier rape cases with similarities to the murder.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Palmer faces a dilemma during a hit-and-run investigation when he spots a stranger standing on a ledge, and places his own life in peril in an attempt to get the man down to safety.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The wife of a man who Danny helped to convict for manslaughter arrives at the TAC offices with a bomb, and takes the team hostage to force Bull to prove her husband's innocence.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part two of three. Stewie tries to find the man he believes to be his biological father after seeing him on TV, only to discover the stranger is in fact his future self - on holiday in present-day San Francisco. Featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part three of three. Stewie discovers what his life is like in the future, and decides to go back in time to change events. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: A trip into the woods turns into a terrifying battle against the forces of evil in this remake of Sam Raimi's ferocious 1981 horror classic. Mia (Jane Levy) is a heroin addict whose most recent overdose was nearly her last. Recognizing that she won't survive another, Mia's longtime friends Olivia (Jessica Lucas) and Eric (Lou Taylor Pucci) take the troubled girl to her family's old cabin in the woods to quit cold turkey. It isn't their first attempt, but this time they're hoping that with Mia's brother David (Shiloh Fernandez) around, she'll have the support she needs to weather the coming storm. The moment David arrives at the cabin with his girlfriend Natalie (Elizabeth Blackmore), strange things start to happen; Mia complains about a foul smell that none of her friends can sense, and upon descending into the fruit cellar David and Eric discover what appears to be the scene of a dark ritual. Scattered amongst the animal corpses and mysterious artifacts is an old book that's been sealed shut with heavy-duty plastic and barbed wire. Intrigued, Eric manages to cut the book free and makes a disturbing discovery -- the book has been bound in human flesh, and it comes with an incantation that will unleash a powerful force of evil. Ignoring the warnings not to speak or even hear the incantation, Eric reads the words aloud, sealing his own dark fate, as well as those of his closest friends. One by one they will be possessed until no soul has been left unclaimed. The lucky ones will die first, their souls condemned to suffer as their bodies are twisted into an obscene aberration of flesh. Will the last person standing have the courage to send these sadistic demons back to hell, even if it means killing their friends and loved ones in the worst way imaginable, or will the forces unleashed by this unholy book prove too powerful for any one mortal to defeat?(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lost Our Lisa. Lisa Simpson (voice of Yeardley Smith) has been looking forward to seeing a special exhibit of rare Egyptian lore at the Springtonian Museum called "the Treasures of Isis," and her mother Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) promises to take her on the show's final day. However, Marge's plans change when Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) comes home with various items from "Yuk-ingham Palace," the neighborhood novelty shop, super-glued to his face and she has to take him to the doctor. While Marge insists Lisa must stay home, Lisa tricks her easily misled father Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) into giving his permission for her to take the bus to the museum. But Lisa misreads the schedule and ends up on the outskirts of Springfield, and she flies into a panic when she ends up in the city's Russian district. When Homer and Marge realize Lisa is lost, Homer leaps into action to find her, though his actions make a difficult situation all the more complicated. programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Down to the Sea in Ships
programme.desc: Sea captain Bering Joy takes his grandson Jed on a whaling trip to teach him about life's challenges and truths, while first mate Dan Lunceford's assignment to look after the lad has dramatic consequences on a voyage packed with incident and danger. Seafaring adventure, starring Lionel Barrymore, Richard Widmark, and Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: A wannabe police officer persuades his girlfriend's tough detective brother to take him along on duty. The cop hopes to scare his unwanted partner away from his sister by exposing him to danger - but needs some help when the patrol leads to a run-in with the city's most wanted criminal. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Sightseers
programme.desc: A woman leading a sheltered life joins her new boyfriend on a caravanning holiday. His love of obscure tourist spots conceals a fierce rage that leads him to murder anyone who spoils their excursions, but this dark side only excites his timid travelling companion, who begins a killing spree of her own. Comedy horror, starring Alice Lowe and Steve Oram.(n)

programme.title: Black Rock
programme.desc: Three women try to rebuild their lost friendship by exploring a deserted island they first visited as children. They befriend three hunters, but when one of them turns violent, they kill him in self-defence. The two remaining men want revenge, leaving the women facing a battle for survival. Thriller, directed by and starring Katie Aselton. With Lake Bell and Kate Bosworth.(n)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: A passionate but incompetent basketball coach learns that only the four best teams in his league will be carried over to a new division. So to stop his team languishing at the bottom of the heap, he recruits an ageing star player to turn their fortunes around. Comedy set in the 1970s, starring Will Ferrell, Woody Harrelson and Andre Benjamin.(n)

programme.title: Two Rode Together
programme.desc: The desperate relatives of people captured by Comanches many years before put pressure on the US military to bring them home. The army hires a cynical frontier marshal, who agrees to negotiate their release in return for a commission. But the townsfolk are forced to face some grim truths when he returns with just one unrecognisable captive. John Ford's Western, with James Stewart, Richard Widmark and Shirley Jones.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Terror by Night
programme.desc: The legendary sleuth and his faithful sidekick Dr Watson hunt for the killer of an aristocrat who hired them to keep a priceless diamond out of the hands of thieves. Mystery, starring Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce, Alan Mowbray, Dennis Hoey and Mary Forbes.(n)

programme.title: Halls of Montezuma
programme.desc: A US Marine unit fighting in the Pacific is ordered to capture Japanese troops so they can be interrogated for information about a new weapons base - but the mission proves even more difficult than expected. Second World War adventure, starring Richard Widmark, Jack Palance, Reginald Gardiner, Robert Wagner and Karl Malden.(n)

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: Withdrawn, mute 10-year-old Philip is ignored by his parents and goes off to explore Dartmoor alone, where he meets a retired colonel who shares his knowledge of Devon's wildlife. Under the older man's nurturing tutelage, the boy begins to tame a wild white colt, but fate proffers a series of setbacks just as real progress is being made. Children's drama, starring John Mills, Mark Lester, Sylvia Syms and Bernard Miles.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: Ted

The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)
